job_description:

4. Support database management and maintain accurate candidate records.
5. Contribute creative ideas to improve candidate experience and recruitment efficiency.
6. Prepare reports and presentations related to hiring outcomes and campaign analysis.
7. Ensure consistency of company messaging across all recruitment and communication channels.
